title: Halliburton posts loss as charges weigh
text:

Mon, Oct 19, 2015, 12:09 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 21 mins Halliburton posts loss as charges weigh Reuters – 7 minutes ago View Photo 
Various Halliburton equipment being stored at the equipment yard in Alvarado, Texas June 2, 2015. REUTERS/Cooper … 
(Reuters) - Halliburton Co (HAL.N), the world's No.2 oilfield services provider, posted a quarterly loss, hurt mainly by charges related to asset write-offs and severance costs. 
Net loss attributable to the company was $54 million (35 million pounds), or 6 cents per share, in the third quarter ended Sept. 30, compared with a profit of $1.20 billion, or $1.41 per share, a year earlier. 
Revenue fell nearly 36 percent to $5.58 billion.
